channel.title: Please look need help

item.title: Please look need help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

int total = 0;
		
	for (int i = 0; i < playerXP.length; i++) {
		total += getLevelForXP(playerXP[i]);
	}
		
	sendQuest("Total Lvl: "+total+"", 3984);

Make sure the levels are being saved/updated properly

Read full topic

item.title: Please look need help
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

Im using an older delta source just messing around with it and total level doesnt move when you level up skills it just stays at 30. tried relogging and restarting it still says 30

int a0 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); int a1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]); int a2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); int a3 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); int a4 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]); int a5 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); int a6 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]); int a7 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]); int a8 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]); int a9 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]); int a10 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]); int a11 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]); int a12 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]); int a13 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]); int a14 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]); int a15 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]); int a16 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[16]); int a17 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]); int a18 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]); int a19 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]); int a20 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]); int a21 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[21]); total = a0+a1+a2+a3+a4+a5+a6+a7+a8+a9+a10+a11+a12+a13+a14+a15+a16+a17+a18+a19+a20; sendQuest("Total Lvl: "+total+"", 3984);

it looks correct to me can anybody point out why this is doing this?
